params._chainId: Chain Id of the current chain
params._protocolPercentageFee: Protocol percentage fee (min: %0.01).                               This fee goes to treasury from each wrapAndSwap request
params._relay: Address of BitcoinRelay which checks Bitcoin transactions inclusion
params._startingBlockNumber: Transactions that are included in blocks older                             than _startingBlockNumber cannot be processed

isRequestUsed(bytes32).details: It prevents re-submitting a processed request

params._txId: The transaction ID of request on Bitcoin

returns._0: True if the cc exchange request has been already executed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

retryFailedWrapAndSwap(bytes,bytes32,byt.details: Users can retry their failed exchange request if      their request destination is different from the current chain

params._message: ABI encode of (txId, outputAmount, acrossRelayerFee, exchangePath)

setAcross(address).details: Across is used to send exchanged tokens to other chains

setChainIdMapping(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Requests are submitted on the middle chain and the final token is sent to the destination chain.For example, for Ethereum, the middle chain is Polygon and the destination chain is Ethereum.

setExchangeConnector(uint256,address).details: Users determine which DEX to use by determining the app id.

setThirdPartyAddress(uint256,address).details: Each third party has an id and an address.      Users determine the third party by determining the id in the request.      Third party fee is sent to the third party address.

setThirdPartyFee(uint256,uint256).details: Third party fee is a percentage of the input amount.      Third parties can set their own fees.

supportChain(uint256).details: Users can only submit exchange requests for supported chains.

supportToken(uint256,address).details: Users can only submit exchange requests for supported tokens.      By default, all tokens are supported on the current chain.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawFailedWrapAndSwap(bytes,bytes32,.details: Users can get their BTC back if the request execution failed      and their request destination is different from the current chain

params._lockerLockingScript: Script hash of locker that user has sent BTC to it
params._message: ABI encode of (txId, scriptType, userScript, acrossRelayerFee)

wrapAndSwap((bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,u.details: Steps to process a request:      1. Check transaction inclusion on Bitcoin      2. Extract the request info      3. Mint TeleBTC and send fees to protocol, Locker, and third party      4. Exchange TeleBTC for the output token      5.1 Send the output token to the user      5.2 Send TeleBTC to user if exchange fails and the request belongs to the current chain      5.3 Keep TeleBTC if exchange fails and the request doesn't blong to the current chain

params._lockerLockingScript: Script hash of Locker that user has sent BTC to it
params._path: (Optional) Exchange path from teleBTC to the output token.

FailedWrapAndSwap(address,address,addres.notice: Emits when a cc exchange request fails

FillStarted(bytes32,uint256).notice: Emits when a request is filled for the first time

NewChainIdMapping(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Emits when changes made to chain id mapping

NewFill(address,bytes32,address,uint256).notice: Emits when a new filler fills a request

NewInstantRouter(address,address).notice: Emits when instant router contract updated

NewThirdPartyAddress(uint256,address,add.notice: Emits when changes made to third party address

NewThirdPartyFee(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Emits when changes made to third party fee

NewWrapAndSwap(address,address,address[2.notice: Emits when a cc exchange request gets done

NewWrappedNativeToken(address,address).notice: Emits when changes made to wrapped native token

SetExchangeConnector(uint256,address).notice: Emits when appId for an exchange connector is set

extractChainId(uint256).notice: Return the middle chain and destination chain from chainId

extractDestinationChainId(uint256).notice: Return the destination chain from chainId

isRequestUsed(bytes32).notice: Check if a request has been processed

removeChain(uint256).notice: Remove a chain from supported chains

removeToken(uint256,address).notice: Remove a token from supported tokens

setExchangeConnector(uint256,address).notice: Assign an exchange connector to an app id

setInstantRouter(address).notice: Address of special Teleporter that can submit requests

supportToken(uint256,address).notice: Support a new token on specific chain

withdrawFailedWrapAndSwap(bytes,bytes32,.notice: Request BTC for failed exchange request

wrapAndSwap((bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,u.notice: Process a wrapAndSwap request after checking its inclusion on Bitcoin
